abstract: A Dubai court restarted a fraud trial against two former executives of Dubai Islamic Bank Sunday having changed their status to government officials, making a stricter punishment more likely, Reuters reported.
snippet: A Dubai court restarted a fraud trial against two former executives of Dubai Islamic Bank Sunday having changed their status to government officials, making a stricter punishment more likely, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: A Dubai court has restarted a fraud trial against two former executives of Dubai Islamic Bank. The court changed their status to government officials on Sunday, making a stricter punishment more likely, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Ex-Executives of Dubai Bank Face Heavier Penalties
